name: JB The Super Bass
overview: JB The Super Bass is a bass fishing game developed by Gaps that is endorsed and named for the Japan Bass Club Association (the eponymous "JB"). It also features and is licensed by various real-life fishing products in Japan, such as Gary Yamamoto Custom Baits, Ranger Boats and Mamiya-OP. The goal of the game is to catch as many bass as possible by finding the ideal spot to fish and reeling them up. There is also a license mode where the player first has to complete a multiple-choice test to earn their fishing license.
